title: Rolf Harris in Tasmania
creator_contributor_role: Tasmanian State Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Tasmania - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Tasmania - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Description and travel
description: International TV artist, musician and comedian Rolf Harris visits the major tourist attractions of Tasmania. The film highlights national parks, islands, buildings, cities and towns, as well as industrial undertakings such as mining, paper mills, forestry and hydro-electric works. The leisurely pace of life and the recreational facilities of Tasmania are emphasised through the eyes of this famous Australian.
